phrases.en: I expect that it'll happen one day

phrases.en: I expect that it'll happen sooner or later

phrases.en: I suppose [z] that it'll be the best decision in this situation
phrases.ru: Я предполагаю, что это будет лучшее решение в этой ситуации

phrases.en: I suppose [z] that it'll be a good solution to this problem

phrases.en: I believe [v] that it'll be really so
